thread.title: Hotel Saint Marc
thread.title_full: Hotel Saint Marc - Review of Hotel Saint-Marc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: stephanep293
title: Hotel Saint Marc
text:
Hotel Saint Marc is a gem in Paris. My experience was excellent and my expectations were surpassed.
The interior design from lobby to the actual rooms are exquisite, and despite the size of the hotel, the facilities feel spacious and comfortable. But what I need to point out is the service. The management and staff of Hotel Saint Marc have provided me with the highest level of service I've experienced in Paris.
